page.title: 04CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: In Rushenden it is sometimes good fun but sometimes it is boring. I play on my bike or skates. I wish it had an ice-rink like Gillingham. I play round the shops and in the playing field with my sister and friends. We like to play{Sticky Toffee. You start with one person crossing their hands and all the others each hold a finger. Then she calls out all the names of the people holding her fingers. When she gets to the last one they all run away. If she catches one of them they have to stand still with their arms out until another person crawls between their legs and releases them. I hardly ever watch television. I mostly play in my spare time.
